title: "I AM" Affirmations and the Secret of Their Effective Use
description: This is a handbook for Mastery. Here are the detailed yet easy to follow instructions on meditation, the inner instruction on how to make affirmations work for you, and the often requested "I AM" Affirmations which Peter previously only gave in retreats and private classes. Now these are available to the public. This powerful book is a long awaited, practical handbook for Mastery with specific affirmations for every aspect of life.
author: Peter Mt. Shasta
